memberdef.argsstring: (rocblas_handle handle, rocblas_int n, const rocblas_half *alpha, const rocblas_half *x, rocblas_int incx, rocblas_half *y, rocblas_int incy)
memberdef.name: rocblas_haxpy

detaileddescription.para: axpy compute y := alpha * x + y

parameterdescription.para: rocblas_handle. handle to the rocblas library context queue.
pointer storing vector x on the GPU.
rocblas_int specifies the increment for the elements of x.
pointer storing vector y on the GPU.
rocblas_int specifies the increment for the elements of y.

memberdef.argsstring: (rocblas_handle handle, rocblas_int n, const float *alpha, const float *x, rocblas_int incx, float *y, rocblas_int incy)
memberdef.name: rocblas_saxpy

memberdef.argsstring: (rocblas_handle handle, rocblas_int n, const double *alpha, const double *x, rocblas_int incx, double *y, rocblas_int incy)
memberdef.name: rocblas_daxpy
